DOCUMENT_STATUS_IN_USE: The document status is being used in one or more documents. So the document status cannot be deleted.
DOCUMENT_TYPE_IN_USE: The document type is being used in one or more documents. So the document type cannot be deleted.
NOT_FOUND: The requested resource was not found!
TOO_EARLY_TO_RESEND_OTP: Please wait 30 seconds before resending OTP!
